OutcomeValue.title: Cannot tell
OutcomeValue.description: it is unclear if the subject passed or failed the test

OutcomeValue.title: Inapplicable
OutcomeValue.description: the test is not applicable to the subject

OutcomeValue.title: Untested
OutcomeValue.description: the test has not been carried out

TestMode.title: Automatic
TestMode.description: where the test was carried out automatically by the software tool and without any human intervention

TestMode.title: Manual
TestMode.description: where the test was carried out by human evaluators

TestMode.title: Semi-Automatic
TestMode.description: where the test was partially carried out by software tools, but where human input or judgment was still required to decide or help decide the outcome of the test

TestMode.title: Undisclosed
TestMode.description: where the exact testing process is undisclosed

TestMode.title: Unknown
TestMode.description: where the testing process is unknown or undetermined
